title: 2005년 Clyburn 사건
summary: 미국 Virginia, VA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Clyburn. 판결일: 2005-05-13. 법원: District Court, W.D. Virginia.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America v. Larry A. CLYBURN, Defendant
**판결일**: 2005-05-13
**법원**: District Court, W.D. Virginia
**관할**: Virginia, VA

**판사**: Jones

## 변호인

Randy Ramseyer, Assistant United States Attorney, Abingdon, Virginia, for, United States; Michael A. Bragg, Abing-don, Virginia, for Defendant.

## 인용

- 368 F. Supp. 2d 545

## 판결문 요약


368 F.Supp.2d 545 (2005)
UNITED STATES of America
v.
Larry A. CLYBURN, Defendant.
No. 1:04 CR 00050.
United States District Court, W.D. Virginia. Big Stone Gap Division.
May 13, 2005.
*546 Randy Ramseyer, Assistant United States Attorney, Abingdon, Virginia, for United States; Michael A. Bragg, Abingdon, Virginia, for Defendant.

OPINION SETTING FORTH REASONS FOR SENTENCE
JONES, Chief District Judge.
For the reasons set forth in this opinion, I find it reasonable to sentence the defendant to a sentence below the advisory guideline range.
A jury in this court convicted the defendant, Larry A. Clyburn, of conspiracy to manufacture 50 grams or more of methamphetamine (Count One); manufacturing 50 grams or more of methamphetamine (Count Two); possession of pseudoephedrine with intent to manufacture methamphetamine (Count Three); maintaining a place for the purpose of manufacturing methamphetamine (Count Four); endangering human life while manufacturing methamphetamine (Count Five); possession of a firearm in furtherance of a drug trafficking offense (Count Six); and possession of a firearm by an unlawful user of a controlled substance (Count Seven). Following the verdict, I entered a judgment of acquittal as to Count Six, holding that the government had presented insufficient evidence that the defendant's admitted possession of a firearm was in furtherance of drug trafficking offense in violation of 18 U.S.C.A. § 924(c) (West 2000). See United States v. Clyburn, No. 1:04CR00050,...
